entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 28. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 28. Wind chill near minus 45. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 09:00 AM MST Friday 06 January 2023
